data.text: Sɛdeɛ nnomaa a wɔaka wɔn afiri pirebuo mu
Momma Moabfoɔ adwanefoɔ no ne mo ntena;
Ɔdɔ mu na Onyankopɔn bɛsi ahennwa bi;
Ahosɛpɛ ne anigyeɛ nni mfikyifuo no mu;
Mesi apinie wɔ mʼakoma mu wɔ Moab ho
Sɛ Moab kɔ ne sorɔnsorɔmmea a,
Yei ne asɛm a Awurade aka dada afa Moab ho.
Nanso seesei Awurade ka sɛ, “Mfeɛ mmiɛnsa mu, sɛdeɛ wɔkan ɔpaani mfeɛ no, Moab animuonyam bɛba awieeɛ, na ne nkaeɛfoɔ no bɛyɛ kakra bi a wonni ahoɔden.”
